protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for alpha-ketoglutarate. Seems to act exclusively through a G(q)-mediated pathway

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Lee DK, Nguyen T, Lynch KR, Cheng R, Vanti WB, Arkhitko O, Lewis T, Evans JF, George SR, O'Dowd BF: Discovery and mapping of ten novel G protein-coupled receptor genes. Gene. 2001 Sep 5;275(1):83-91.
